verses.verse: וַיִּ֨מְלָךְ־ <S%H4427><s%> reigned מֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹֽאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah תַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> place כָּנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3659><s%> instead of Coniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְה֣וֹיָקִ֔ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הִמְלִ֛יךְ <S%H4427><s%> made king נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> whom Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> neither שָׁמַ֛ע <S%H8085><s%> did hearken ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> But neither he nor his servants וְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> nor the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> unto the words יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> which he spake בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king צִדְקִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H6667><s%> And Zedekiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּכַ֣ל <S%H3081><s%> Jehucal בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֗ה <S%H8018><s%> of Shelemiah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צְפַנְיָ֤הוּ <S%H6846><s%> and Zephaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַֽעֲשֵׂיָה֙ <S%H4641><s%> of Maaseiah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> to the prophet לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִתְפַּלֶּל־ <S%H6419><s%> Pray נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please בַעֲדֵ֔נוּ <S%H5704><s%> against אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> now unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God

וְיִרְמְיָ֕הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Now Jeremiah בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> came in וְיֹצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> and went out בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> for they had not put אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court [הַכְּלִיא כ] (הַכְּלֽוּא׃ <S%H3628><s%> prison ק)

וְחֵ֥יל <S%H2428><s%> army פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> Then Pharaoh's יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> was come forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וַיִּשְׁמְע֨וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard הַכַּשְׂדִּ֜ים <S%H3778><s%> and when the Chaldeans הַצָּרִ֤ים <S%H6696><s%> that besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁמְעָ֔ם <S%H8088><s%> tidings וַיֵּ֣עָל֔וּ <S%H5927><s%> of them they departed מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> the from יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> unto the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַשֹּׁלֵ֧חַ <S%H7971><s%> that sent אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to לְדָרְשֵׁ֑נִי <S%H1875><s%> you unto me to enquire הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> Behold חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> army פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> of me Behold Pharaoh's הַיֹּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> which is come forth לָכֶם֙ לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <S%H5833><s%> to help שָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> you shall return לְאַרְצ֖וֹ <S%H776><s%> into their own land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt

וְשָׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> shall come again הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> And the Chaldeans וְנִלְחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> and fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> against this city הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> and they וּלְכָדֻ֖הָ <S%H3920><s%> and take וּשְׂרָפֻ֥הָ <S%H8313><s%> it and burn בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> it with fire ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּשִּׁ֤אוּ <S%H5377><s%> Deceive נַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5315><s%> not yourselves לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָלֹ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall surely יֵלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> go מֵעָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and הַכַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> The Chaldeans כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> go

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> even אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הִכִּיתֶ֞ם <S%H5221><s%> For though ye had smitten כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the entire חֵ֤יל <S%H2428><s%> the whole army כַּשְׂדִּים֙ <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans הַנִּלְחָמִ֣ים <S%H3898><s%> that fight אִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H854><s%> against וְנִ֨שְׁאֲרוּ <S%H7604><s%> against you and there remained בָ֔ם אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> every man מְדֻקָּרִ֑ים <S%H1856><s%> [but] wounded אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each בְּאָהֳלוֹ֙ <S%H168><s%> in his tent יָק֔וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> among them [yet] should they rise up וְשָֽׂרְפ֛וּ <S%H8313><s%> and burn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> this city הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> with בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> happened בְּהֵֽעָלוֹת֙ <S%H5927><s%> was broken up חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> And it came to pass that when the army הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> for fear חֵ֥יל <S%H2428><s%> army פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh's ס

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> went forth יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> Then Jeremiah מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> out of Jerusalem לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin לַחֲלִ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> to separate מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> himself thence in the midst הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ה֞וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> And when he was in the gate בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וְשָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> was there בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> a captain פְּקִדֻ֔ת <S%H6488><s%> of the ward וּשְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> [was] there whose name יִרְאִיָּ֔יה <S%H3376><s%> [was] Irijah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֖ה <S%H8018><s%> of Shelemiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲנַנְיָ֑ה <S%H2608><s%> of Hananiah וַיִּתְפֹּ֞שׂ <S%H8610><s%> and he took אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> to the Chaldeans אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You נֹפֵֽל׃ <S%H5307><s%> Thou fallest away

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יִרְמְיָ֜הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah שֶׁ֗קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [It is] false אֵינֶ֤נִּי <S%H369><s%> I am not נֹפֵל֙ <S%H5307><s%> I fall not away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> to the Chaldeans וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> But he hearkened אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּתְפֹּ֤שׂ <S%H8610><s%> took יִרְאִיָּיה֙ <S%H3376><s%> not to him so Irijah בְּיִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah וַיְבִאֵ֖הוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׂרִֽים׃ <S%H8269><s%> him to the princes

וַיִּקְצְפ֧וּ <S%H7107><s%> were wroth הַשָּׂרִ֛ים <S%H8269><s%> Wherefore the princes עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> at יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> with Jeremiah וְהִכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְנָתְנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> him and put אוֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house הָאֵס֗וּר <S%H612><s%> him in prison בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> for they had made לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הַכֶּֽלֶא׃ <S%H3608><s%> that the prison

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֧א <S%H935><s%> was entered יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <S%H3414><s%> When Jeremiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court הַבּ֖וֹר <S%H953><s%> cistern וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַֽחֲנֻ֑יוֹת <S%H2588><s%> and into the cabins וַיֵּֽשֶׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> had remained שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> and Jeremiah יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> there many פ

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king צִדְקִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Then Zedekiah וַיִּקָּחֵ֗הוּ <S%H3947><s%> and took him out וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֨הוּ <S%H7592><s%> asked הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king בְּבֵיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> in his house בַּסֵּ֔תֶר <S%H5643><s%> him secretly וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הֲיֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> Is there [any] word מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah יֵ֔שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> for said בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon תִּנָּתֵֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> he thou shalt be delivered ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Moreover Jeremiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king צִדְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah מֶה֩ <S%H4100><s%> what חָטָ֨אתִֽי <S%H2398><s%> What have I offended לְךָ֤ וְלַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> against thee or against thy servants וְלָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> or against this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that נְתַתֶּ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> that ye have put אוֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court הַכֶּֽלֶא׃ <S%H3608><s%> prison
